projects.title: BeeSupervisor
projects.description: Varroa mites are Parasites, that live in bee colonies on the back of the bees. Every year about 20% of the colonies die due to Varroa infection. With two friends I built a monitoring solution that detects the current infection rate. Two cameras film the incoming bees at the hive entrance and an artificial intelligence determines the infected bees. According to the infection rate the beekeeper can initiate the needed treatment.

projects.title: Convex Hulls
